title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Meet Ultra Skelly: Skelly the Skeleton Gets a High-Tech Edition This Halloween
items.description: The new 6'5'' version of Skelly has digital eyeballs, audio options, and a motion sensor. It’s available to buy starting today.

items.title: The US Military Is Raking in Millions From On-Base Slot Machines

items.title: Lyft and China’s Baidu look to bring robotaxis to Europe next year
items.description: The companies want to launch the robotaxi services in Germany and the U.K. first, pending regulatory approval.

items.title: Amazon shuts down Wondery podcast studio, cuts 110 jobs

items.title: Google removes over 50 DEI groups from a list of groups it helps fund
items.description: Google removed the name of 58 DEI groups from its list, including the Latino Leadership Alliance and the ACLU of Illinois.

items.title: Spotify raises subscription prices
items.description: Spotify is raising prices for users in some international markets after a rough quarterly earnings report.

items.title: North Korean spies posing as remote workers have infiltrated hundreds of companies, says CrowdStrike

items.title: What’s Inside the Tiny Miracle Food Pouches That Can Save the Lives of Starving Gazans
items.description: Packed with calories and protein, the same magic mixture has successfully treated famine for decades—but due to funding cuts it's now in short supply.

items.title: 8 Best Handheld Gaming Consoles (2025), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: The second golden age of portable gaming is here. These are the top gadgets for taking your video games on the go.
